content.body: alternatively, should any test that requires the host be able to detach array buffers have something like `includes: [detachArrayBuffer.js]`?
content.formatted_body: alternatively, should any test that requires the host be able to detach array buffers have something like includes: [detachArrayBuffer.js]?

content.body: You might have to ask Rick about the test262-harness env, but my understanding is that the environment is only required to provide the global names that are listed in INTERPRETING.md
I think test262-harness loads the engines' JS shells, like d8 - I'm not sure those have structured clone available
